properties.areaDesc: Dyer, TN; Obion, TN; Gibson, TN
properties.headline: Flood Warning issued February 14 at 10:22AM CST until February 16 at 4:00AM CST by NWS Memphis TN
properties.description:
The Flood Warning continues for the Obion River...S.F. of the Forked
Deer River.

The Flood Warning continues for
the Obion River near Obion
* until Saturday February 15.
* At 10 AM Friday the stage was 34.7 feet.
* Minor flooding is occurring and Minor flooding is forecast.
* Maximum forecast stage of 34.7 feet on Friday February 14.
* Flood stage is 34.0 feet.
* The river will begin to fall Saturday February 15 and fall to flood
stage Sunday February 16.
* At 35.0 feet...Several secondary roads and large areas of farm land
are flooded in northern Dyer County. Flooding is occurring around
Rives in southeast Obion County.
properties.instruction:
A followup Flood Statement will be issued Saturday or sooner if
conditions warrant.

For graphical river and flood information...please go to
www.weather.gov and click near Memphis on the map, then select Rivers
and Lakes.

Do not drive through flooded areas...turn around don't drown.

Stay tuned to your weather radio and your local news media for the
latest river information.
